ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T03:20:00 [Issue ID 4000-346304] urn:comicvine:4000-346304
ComicInfo.Summary: There has never been a gathering of heroes like this before. But we've never faced the end of the world before! A collection of Dynamite's greatest characters, including Red Sonja, Vampirella and even Dracula himself, must band together in a desperate attempt to save the world from Mayan 2012 Doomsday Prophecy. But when your allies include the lord of all vampires, everyone will be at each other's throats -- literally! An earth-shattering storyline from crossover-king writer Ron Marz and fan-favorite artist Walter Geovani!
